dmca.title: **** SPAM **** !!** DMCA Immediate Takedown Request
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Epstein, Michael (FL-Legal) (Infolink) [mailto:mepstein@infolink.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 28, 2006 3:37 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: **** SPAM **** !!** DMCA Immediate Takedown Request


VIA FEDEX & E-MAIL
March 28, 2006

The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite #110
Dallas, TX 75207

ATTN: General Counsel


Re:  Immediate Takedown Request 

Dear Sir or Madam:

Please be advised that Infolink Group, Inc. and its affiliated companies
(collectively "Infolink") are the exclusive owners of certain copyrights and
trademarks (the "Infolink Properties"), including, but not limited to the
brand "ServerPronto" and all of the contents located at the URL,
http://www.serverpronto.com.

Notwithstanding this, it has come to our attention that the Internet site(s)
located below, for which The Planet Internet Services, Inc., et. al, is a
service provider; this situation constitutes an unauthorized use of the
Infolink Properties.  Infolink diligently enforces its rights to the
Infolink Properties in all forms of media.  As you may be aware, Service
Providers can be held liable if they do not respond to claims of
infringement pursuant to the requirements of the Digital Millennium
Copyright Act (the "DMCA").  In accordance with the DMCA, we are notifying
you of the aforementioned infringements of the Infolink Properties.


Infringing Domain Name: www.disenototal.com  

Infringing Content: All pages and design. Copy of source below indicating
was copied from serverpronto.com website.
 

We hereby request that you act expeditiously to remove or disable access to
the unauthorized use of the Infolink Properties on this Internet Domain
which you act as a Service Provider (registrar).

Please contact me regarding this matter at your earliest convenience.

Under the penalty of perjury, the undersigned is authorized to act on behalf
of Infolink with respect to this matter and the information contained in
this transmission is accurate.  Please contact me regarding this matter at
your earliest convenience.

Finally, please be advised that this letter is not intended as a complete
statement of the facts or law as they pertain to this matter, and that
Infolink reserves all rights and remedies.

Very truly yours,

Michael Epstein/Legal
mepstein@infolink.com

-----------------------------------------
Copy of Source at www.disenototal.com as of 4PM EST March 28,2006
